shoes.name: Air Max 270
shoes.description: The Air Max 270 features Nike’s biggest heel air unit yet, offering a smooth ride and stylish design.

shoes.name: UltraBoost 21
shoes.description: A running shoe that merges performance with style, featuring Adidas’ energy-returning Boost technology.

shoes.name: Cortez
shoes.description: A timeless classic, the Nike Cortez combines a sleek design with comfort for everyday wear.

shoes.name: New Balance 990v5
shoes.description: This American-made sneaker offers superior cushioning and stability for all-day comfort.

shoes.name: Gel-Kayano 28
shoes.description: A high-performance running shoe with enhanced support and shock absorption, ideal for long-distance runners.

shoes.name: Hirako
shoes.description: Innovative Swiss-engineered running shoes, offering a lightweight, cushioned ride.

shoes.name: Converse Chuck Taylor
shoes.description: The iconic Chuck Taylor sneaker, known for its timeless design and unmatched versatility.

shoes.name: Vans Old Skool
shoes.description: Skate-ready and street-style approved, the Old Skool offers durable construction with signature Vans flair.

shoes.name: Adizero Adios Pro
shoes.description: A lightweight, marathon-ready racing shoe designed for top performance with cutting-edge technology.

shoes.name: Puma RS-X
shoes.description: The Puma RS-X offers bold style with retro-inspired design elements and supreme comfort.
